VOWEL SOUNDS

Vowel Sounds is the debut album-length 'blockchain bluegrass' offering from Justin Myles Holmes.

Contribute ETH
Get Vowel Sounds, Encrypted
The ciphertext of the record is available for download. Once the contract reaches 10ETH, the decryption ley will become available.

Featuring some of the world's most talented and accomplished bluegrass instrumentalists on banjo, fiddle, mandolin, dobro, and upright bass. Vowel Sounds contains nine original songs, with lyrics addressing surveillance, crypto-economics on the world stage, and an optimistic outlook on the future of humanity and technology. The record also features one classic video game instrumental. On the record, Holmes plays guitar, tin whistle, vocals, overtone singing, melodica, and a unique double flute.
